channel.title: Comments on: Ever had to maintain a large platform used by many developers over many years?

item.title: By: flack
item.dc:creator: flack
item.description: Seal, Seal, Seal, Seal. No question. Look forward. Way past you'd ever think your software will be used. Then add a few more dozen decades to it.
item.content:encoded: Seal, Seal, Seal, Seal. No question. Look forward. Way past you’d ever think your software will be used. Then add a few more dozen decades to it.
